EditInstanceDetails.directoryDescription: Increase your audience by appearing in the Owncast Directory. This is an external service run by the Owncast project. Learn more.
EditInstanceDetails.offlineMessageDescription: The offline message is displayed to your page visitors when you're not streaming. Markdown is supported.
EditInstanceDetails.serverUrlRequiredForDirectory: You must set your Server URL above to enable the directory.

HardwareInfo.title: Hardware Info
HardwareInfo.noDetails: No hardware details have been collected yet.

ViewerInfo.title: Viewer Info
ViewerInfo.noData: No viewer data has been collected yet.

VideoVariantForm.bitrateDisabledPassthrough: Bitrate selection is disabled when Video Passthrough is enabled.
VideoVariantForm.bitrateGoodForHigh: Good for high speed & high bitrate viewers.
VideoVariantForm.bitrateGoodForMost: Good for most viewers, bandwidths and resolutions.
VideoVariantForm.bitrateGoodForSlow: Good for slow, mobile and low bitrate viewers.

Admin.emojiPageDescription: Here you can upload new custom emojis for usage in the chat. When uploading a new emoji, the filename without extension will be used as emoji name. Additionally, emoji names are case-insensitive. For best results, ensure all emoji have unique names.
Admin.emojiUploadBulkGuide: Want to upload custom emojis in bulk? Check out our Emoji guide.

Actions.title: External Actions
Actions.description: External action URLs are 3rd party UI you can display, embedded, into your Owncast page when a user clicks on a button to launch your action.
Actions.readMoreLink: Read more about how to use actions, with examples, at
Actions.modalDescription: Add the URL for the external action you want to present.
Actions.onlyHttpsSupported: Only HTTPS URLs and embeds are supported.
Actions.optionalBackgroundColor: Optional background color of the action button.
Actions.openExternally: Open in a new tab instead of within your page.

Webhooks.selectEvents: Select the events that will be sent to this webhook.

AccessTokens.nameDescription: The name will be displayed as the chat user when sending messages with this access token.
AccessTokens.namePlaceholder: Name of bot, service, or integration
AccessTokens.selectPermissions: Select the permissions this access token will have. It cannot be edited after it's created.

BrowserNotifyModal.deniedDescription: To enable push notifications from {{hostname}} access your browser permissions for this site and turn on notifications. Then reload this page to apply your updated settings on this site. Learn more.
BrowserNotifyModal.deniedTitle: Notifications are blocked on your device
BrowserNotifyModal.enabledDescription: To disable push notifications from {{hostname}} access your browser permissions for this site and turn off notifications. Learn more.
BrowserNotifyModal.errorMessage: Error registering for live notifications: {{message}}. Make sure you're not inside a private browser environment or have previously disabled notifications for this stream.
BrowserNotifyModal.iosComeBack: Come back to this screen and enable notifications.
BrowserNotifyModal.iosDescription: It takes a couple extra steps to make sure you get notified when your favorite streams go live.
BrowserNotifyModal.iosNameAndTap: Give this link a name and tap the new icon on your home screen
BrowserNotifyModal.mainDescription: Get notified right in the browser each time this stream goes live.
BrowserNotifyModal.unsupported: Browser notifications are not supported in your browser.
BrowserNotifyModal.unsupportedLocal: Browser notifications are not supported for local servers.

FollowModal.description: By following this stream you'll get notified on the Fediverse when it goes live. Now is a great time to
FollowModal.redirectMessage: You'll be redirected to your Fediverse server and asked to confirm the action.

Header.chatWillBeAvailable: Chat will be available when the stream is live.

NameChangeModal.authInfo: You can also authenticate an IndieAuth or Fediverse account via the "Authenticate" menu.
NameChangeModal.description: Your chat display name is what people see when you send chat messages.

Frontend.offlineBasic: This stream is offline. Check back soon!
Frontend.offlineFediverseOnly: This stream is offline. Follow {{fediverseAccount}} on the Fediverse to see the next time {{streamer}} goes live.
Frontend.offlineNotifyAndFediverse: This stream is offline. You can be notified the next time {{streamer}} goes live or follow {{fediverseAccount}} on the Fediverse.
Frontend.offlineNotifyOnly: This stream is offline. Be notified the next time {{streamer}} goes live.

Testing.noPluralKey: This key has no plural variants - {{count}} things
